channel.title: Posts on Just another data blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Just another data blog

item.title: Mapping my Facebook Messenger Network
item.description: I am currently going through my personal data downloaded from Facebook to better understand my digital footprint and what Facebook knows about me. The Messenger data is an amazing source for text analysis but there is also a wealth of metadata that can be analysed:. here, I look at conversaton participants and I use social network analysis to explore my communication network on Messenger. I hope to answer questions like: how dense is my friendship network?

item.title: Digital voting and blockchain, good or bad idea?
item.description: There have been some attempts to introduce digital in voting and more generally in the democratic process. Could blockchain enhance digital-based voting and help overcome some related challenges such as security?

item.title: Hacking Disinformation with the European External Action Service
item.description: I recently took part in the Disinformation Horizon Hackathon organised by the East StratCom Task Force dedicated to the fight against Russian disinformation using data.

item.title: Hi there, and welcome to Just Another Data Blog!
item.description: Hi there, I just created this blog to showcase my data science projects and share some (hopefully) interesting content about data, social sciences and more!
